title: Get welcome messages within an ad account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: auto_message_type
parameters.description: The type of automatic message to greet people with when they start a conversation with you. Enum value: WELCOME_MESSAGE : welcome message. A welcome message is a message that is automatically sent to welcome people to the conversation after they tap on your ad.

parameters.name: auto_message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic message. When auto_message_type is WELCOME_MESSAGE , you can specify the ID of a welcome message via this field to filter the results. If this field is not passed, all messages that belong to the specified automatic message type will be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-100. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: list
fields.description: The list of automatic messages within the ad account.

fields.name: auto_message_id
fields.description: The ID of the automatic message.

fields.name: auto_message_type
fields.description: The type of automatic message to greet people with when they start a conversation with you. Enum value: WELCOME_MESSAGE : welcome message. A welcome message is a message that is automatically sent to welcome people to the conversation after they tap on your ad.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The name of the welcome message. You can use the name to distinguish between different welcome messages within the welcome message library of your ad account.

fields.name: content
fields.description: The greeting within the welcome message. Example: Hi, thanks for contacting us. How can we help you?

fields.name: suggested_questions
fields.description: A list of suggested questions for customers to tap. A suggested question is a frequently asked question displayed at the beginning of a chat. When the user selects a suggested question, the user will automatically receive the corresponding preset answer.Suggested questions.

fields.name: question
fields.description: A frequently asked question to help users start a conversation.

fields.name: answer
fields.description: The preset answer that will be automatically sent when a user selects the question.

fields.name: audit_status
fields.description: The review status of the automatic message. Enum values: AUDITING : The automatic message is pending review. PASS : The automatic message has been approved. REJECTED : The automatic message has been rejected.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the automatic message was created, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Example: 2025-01-01 00:00:01 .

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information. Note : If auto_message_id is specified in the request, page_info will not be returned.
